#include<iostream>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,c;
		cin>>n>>c;
		ll d1=2*c-n*(n-1);
		ll d2=c-n*(n-1);
		//cout<<d1<<" "<<d2<<endl;
		if(d1>0&&(d1%(2*n)==0))
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else if(d2>0&&(d2%n==0))
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
}
